title: St Philips Medical Centre
description: Our commitment to our patients The doctors, nurses, and all staff are committed to the provision of High-Quality Patient Centred Care and best practices, through the delivery of services that are...
cleaned_text: Our commitment to our patients The doctors, nurses, and all staff are committed to the provision of High-Quality Patient Centred Care and best practices, through the delivery of services that are timely, considerate, and responsive to the needs of our patient population, and supported by a clear focus on excellent customer service. [ Patient Participation ](https://www.stphilipsmedicalcentre.nhs.uk/patient-participation/) Help us shape the way we deliver care to you, our patients. This is your chance to let us know what we are doing well, and what we could be
